trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The debonair dame has lost something of great import.
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_TODO_01<tab>Return the jewelry to the debonair dame.

TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_001<tab>Pardon the imposition, but I am in desperate need of your assistance. I lost several pieces of jewelry that are ever so dear to my heart in the commotion, and I've been quite unable to locate them.
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_003<tab>I am searching for a tiara emblazoned with my house's crest, an engraved necklace, and an amethyst ring. As you might guess, each is a family heirloom.

TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_004<tab>I know not where I dropped them, out of my wits as I was at the time, but they cannot have vanished into thin air. They must be in the city somewhere, if only I had the faintest inkling of where to look...
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_005<tab>Please, might I beg your help? I would give anything to have them safely returned to me.
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_006<tab>I apologize that I have no clearer idea of where I might have dropped them, but please, I need my heirlooms returned to me!
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_100_010<tab>Were you able to locate any of my heirlooms?
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_010<tab>Oh, my, you've found all three! There can be no mistake!

TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_011<tab>“Seek but to serve” is inscribed here, you see? It was my family's motto long before we came to Eulmore. My grandmother taught me its meaning─that we ought always love others before ourselves, aid the poor and the downtrodden...

TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_012<tab>And I see with clarity, now. It is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> spirit that those of us in Eulmore have been lacking, and which we must reclaim. Like my ancestors─like you─we must learn to care for others regardless of the benefit to ourselves.
TEXT_LUCKZH014_03524_LADY03524_000_013<tab>I know not how I can possibly thank you enough for this, but please believe that you have my eternal gratitude.
